sense.def:
A watch
je majhna ura, ki jo nosimo na jermenčku okoli zapestja.

To watch someone or something
pomeni nekoga ali nekaj gledati določeno obdobje in biti pozoren na tisto, kar se dogaja.

seg.quote: When did you last watch a football match?
Their behaviour baffled the watchers in the house.

sense.def:
To watch someone
pomeni tudi nekoga na skrivaj zasledovati ali oprezati za njim.

seg.quote: Liebermann's going to be watched from now on.

sense.def:
To watch a situation
pomeni biti pozoren na določene okoliščine ali se jih zavedati.

seg.quote: She sits back and just watches a situation develop.
Many companies have watched helplessly as their stock prices fell.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
keeps watch
, ves čas gleda okrog sebe, na primer takrat, ko drugi spijo, da jih lahko opozori na nevarnost.

seg.quote: A woman kept watch at the gate.

sense.def:
Watch it
rečemo, kadar želimo nekoga opozoriti, naj bo previden;

To watch out
pomeni biti zelo previden, ker bi se nam lahko zgodilo kaj neprijetnega.

seg.quote: If you don't watch out, he might stick a knife into you.

sense.def:
To watch over someone or something
pomeni skrbeti za nekoga ali nekaj.

seg.quote: The wives took turns to watch over the children.
